t: Amazon.com: Kidde
s: Founded by Walter Kidde, a pioneer in early smoke detection and fire suppression, Kidde is the world’s largest manufacturer of fire safety products. Each day, we work to expand upon our legacy of innovation, providing advanced solutions to protect people and property from fire and related hazards.

t: Kidde Fire Safety Products and Education | Kidde
s: Kidde is the largest manufacturer of fire safety products, including fire extinguisher, carbon monoxide detector and smoke alarm lines available for home safety and business use.

t: Amazon.com: Kidde Carbon Monoxide Detector, Plug In Wall with AA Battery Backup, Test-Hush Button

All you do is plug it in to any outlet (should be below head level when sleeping or resting). It provides so much peace. The best part is that you can easily unplug it and bring it with you when traveling! ... I bought this to take on vacation as a safety ...
